Description: The power of contact center routing made available for orchestrating interactions within CRM, Support workflows and IoT.
Name: Twilio TaskRouter

Methods.Name: List All Workflows
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all the workflows in a workspace

Methods.Name: List All Workspaces
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all the workspaces

Methods.Name: List All Tasks
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all the tasks in a workspace

Methods.Name: Create A Task
Methods.Description: Creates a new task in a workspace

MetaTile: Twilio TaskRouter Integration | Call Center Automation | Cyclr
MetaDescription: Enhance your users' call centers by combining Twilio TaskRouter intelligent skill-based call routing with your application.
Content:
Create and publish integrations between your application and Twilio Task Router.

Let your users automate processes using your application combined with Twilio, all provided within your application.
